abilities.description: When you @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.2f2ba4090b22a122]{Enter the Fray} or @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.a903d120af3b1475]{Battle} against a single worthy foe, reroll any challenge dice. If you set a new objective in a fight by challenging a worthy foe, take +2 momentum.

When you @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.3f5a834fa3fea5d1]{Gain Ground} in personal combat using superficial attacks to probe your opponentâ€™s defenses, or by drawing them off guard with verbal repartee, take +1 momentum on a hit. On a strong hit, also add +1 if you immediately @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.ae5994ceb3cba098]{Strike}.

When you roll a miss with a match in a situation where your reputation is known, you may suffer the cost by envisioning a notable rival who challenges you to a duel. If you defeat them, mark 2 ticks on your quests legacy track. If you decline, mark 1 tick on your bonds legacy track but envision the fallout of this refusal.
